message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor,  a fair starting point considering the inflation we'll both face in later rounds.
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal than your initial offer, but I'm also looking out for myself. Let's see if we can agree on a fair split.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair, given the inflation we've both experienced.  Let's end this before the money becomes truly worthless!
